Acquisition of Baldi:Motherson Group announced on May 3, 2025, that they completed the acquisition of Baldi Industria e Comercio Ltda., which specializes in wrapping solutions and soft-touch surfaces for automotive interiors. This acquisition is expected to strengthen Motherson's presence in the South American market and enhance vertical integration in their Modules & Polymer Products division.

FY 2024-25 Financial Performance:Samvardhana Motherson reported strong financial performance for the year ending March 31, 2025. Consolidated revenues grew 15% to INR 1,136,626 Mn, and EBITDA increased by 17% to INR 108,775 Mn, with a 40% rise in PAT (concern share) to INR 38,030 Mn. The company's Return on Capital Employed (ROCE) also increased to 17.2%.
